english.segment1: Countless are the days, since I last heard your voice, but I still have this sound of your voice in my ear. And I ask myself when will I see you again. The only thing I have left are your letters, written (with love) in blood.
english.segment2: Meanwhile my eyes are almost blind and my ears are almost deaf, I still hope that I will find you at the right time 'cause i know this for sure. You will deliver us from this time of sorrow, no matter what it takes.
english.segment3: You fulfill your plan and you fill my heart with love.
english.segment4: your intention is to bring us together, we don't know how that works. we ignored you, even after all you said, but now it's time to accept this masterplan.
english.segment6: Count on his words, he has never failed. Take this revelation, open this mystery.
